EmailTemplate.name: 201806_Global_Email_JetWave_NewList_mih.201806_Global_Email_JetWave_NewList_mih
EmailTemplate.subject: Never Miss a Moment ✈️
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Traveling doesn’t have to mean missing out on life’s little moments or the action from the big game - if your business jet is powered by JetWave™ <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/products/safety-and-connectivity/jetwave-high-speed-satellite-communications-hardware]]>.
Jet ConneX, hi-speed, in-flight Wi-Fi service that is exclusively powered by JetWave, enables passengers to stay connected from the moment they walk on the plane. No matter how far you fly, the global coverage travels with the plane ensuring the same consistent connectivity in the air as on the ground so you don’t miss a moment in life.
The JetWave satellite communication system is available now and is certified on virtually all super mid-size and larger business jet. Find out what 300 other business jet owners have discovered by leveraging the power of connected.
GET CONNECTED <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/Setting-New-Standards-for-In-Flight-Connectivity]]>
